overview: The film will revolve around a female scholar. Although a scholar, her body does not always give her pleasure. She suffers from Kidney Problem. As a result, he has no control over his own urination. You can't press even if you want to. As it sounds, this is a really big problem in our society. Even after so many years of independence we do not have all the necessary things everywhere. There are many places where there is a need but no toilet. Or even if it is, most of the time it is not usable.
title: Sunetra Sundaram
